lead_paragraph: The failure of politicians to display integrity is not, of course, limited to Britain. It is a problem spread further afield, especially in the rest of Europe.

headline.print_headline: British Voters See Through Their Politicians
headline.main: British Voters See Through Their Politicians

snippet: The failure of politicians to display integrity is not, of course, limited to Britain. It is a problem spread further afield, especially in the rest of Europe.
